Title: Follow: Love Life Ghent
Director: Jan Boon, Yim Brakel, Vincenzo De Jonghe, Alexander Decommere, Laura Hermanides, Niko Himschoot, Anthony Schatteman, Anthony Van Roosendaal, Koen Van Sande
Writer: Niko Boon (segment), Marie Chevalier (segment), Shauni De Gussem (segment), Stephen Dhondt (segment), Vanessa Morgan (segment), Derek O'Connor (segment), Michiel Philippaerts (segment), Lynn Ryssen (segment), Anthony Van Roosendaal (segment), Koen Van Sande (segment)
Actors: Avalon, Lukas Bulteel, Annelies De Nil, Luc De Ruelle
Plot: Ten stories about love in the city of Ghent.
